statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, energy_demand FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT id, location FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE energy_demand > 100;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE time_slot >= '08:00:00' AND time_slot < '12:00:00';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EnergyDistribution;
SELECT AVG(energy_demand) FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE day_of_week = 'Friday';
SELECT location, day_of_week FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE time_slot BETWEEN '10:00:00' AND '14:00:00';
SELECT SUM(energy_demand) FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE day_of_week IN ('Monday', 'Wednesday', 'Friday');
SELECT MAX(energy_demand) FROM EnergyDistribution;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM EnergyDistribution;
SELECT MIN(energy_demand) FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT id, time_slot FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE energy_demand < 50;
SELECT AVG(energy_demand), MIN(energy_demand), MAX(energy_demand) FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE location = 'Chicago';
SELECT id FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE location LIKE '%Center%';
SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution ORDER BY energy_demand DESC;
SELECT location, time_slot FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE day_of_week = 'Thursday' AND energy_demand < 75;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location) FROM EnergyDistribution;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE location = 'Boston' AND day_of_week = 'Tuesday';
SELECT id, energy_demand FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE location = 'San Francisco' ORDER BY time_slot ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE location = 'New York' AND day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT location, time_slot, energy_demand FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE energy_demand > 100 ORDER BY location, day_of_week;
SELECT AVG(energy_demand) AS avg_energy_demand FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE day_of_week = 'Tuesday';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE energy_demand > 200;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS number_of_records FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE location = 'Chicago';
SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE time_slot BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT id, location, energy_demand FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE location LIKE 'L%' AND energy_demand < 50;
SELECT location, SUM(energy_demand) AS total_energy_demand FROM EnergyDistribution GROUP BY location;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS number_of_records FROM EnergyDistribution GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT location, MAX(energy_demand) AS max_energy_demand FROM EnergyDistribution GROUP BY location;
SELECT location, MIN(energy_demand) AS min_energy_demand FROM EnergyDistribution GROUP BY location;
SELECT AVG(energy_demand) AS avg_energy_demand, MAX(energy_demand) AS max_energy_demand, MIN(energy_demand) AS min_energy_demand FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT day_of_week, AVG(energy_demand) AS avg_energy_demand FROM EnergyDistribution GROUP BY day_of_week;
SELECT location, time_slot, energy_demand FROM EnergyDistribution ORDER BY energy_demand DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, time_slot, energy_demand FROM EnergyDistribution ORDER BY energy_demand ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS number_of_records FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE day_of_week IN ('Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday');
SELECT id, location, energy_demand FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS number_of_records FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE energy_demand IS NULL;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS number_of_records FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE energy_demand IS NOT NULL;
SELECT location, day_of_week, COUNT(*) AS number_of_records FROM EnergyDistribution GROUP BY location, day_of_week HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution;
SELECT id, location FROM energy_distribution;
SELECT energy_type FROM energy_distribution WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM cost_reduction;
SELECT strategy, cost_reduction FROM cost_reduction;
SELECT id, implementation_date FROM cost_reduction;
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution WHERE distribution_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution WHERE location LIKE '%City';
SELECT id, strategy FROM energy_distribution CROSS JOIN cost_reduction;
SELECT location, strategy FROM energy_distribution INNER JOIN cost_reduction ON energy_distribution.id = cost_reduction.id;
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution UNION SELECT * FROM cost_reduction;
SELECT location, cost_reduction FROM energy_distribution JOIN cost_reduction USING (id);
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY distribution_time DESC;
SELECT AVG(cost_reduction) FROM cost_reduction;
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM energy_distribution;
SELECT energy_type, COUNT(*) FROM energy_distribution GROUP BY energy_type;
SELECT location, SUM(cost_reduction) FROM energy_distribution JOIN cost_reduction USING (id) GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM cost_reduction WHERE implementation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM cost_reduction WHERE strategy LIKE '%Efficiency%' ORDER BY cost_reduction ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution WHERE location = 'New York' AND energy_type = 'Electricity';
SELECT id, location FROM energy_distribution WHERE distribution_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy, cost_reduction FROM cost_reduction WHERE implementation_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution JOIN cost_reduction ON energy_distribution.id = cost_reduction.id;
SELECT AVG(cost_reduction) AS average_cost_reduction FROM cost_reduction;
SELECT location, SUM(cost_reduction) AS total_cost_saved FROM energy_distribution JOIN cost_reduction ON energy_distribution.id = cost_reduction.id GROUP BY location;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM energy_distribution UNION SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM cost_reduction;
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution WHERE energy_type IN ('Electricity', 'Solar');
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution WHERE distribution_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT location, MAX(cost_reduction) AS max_cost_saved FROM energy_distribution JOIN cost_reduction ON energy_distribution.id = cost_reduction.id GROUP BY location;
SELECT AVG(cost_reduction) AS average_cost_reduction, MAX(cost_reduction) AS max_cost_reduction, MIN(cost_reduction) AS min_cost_reduction FROM cost_reduction GROUP BY strategy;
SELECT strategy, SUM(cost_reduction) AS total_cost_saved FROM cost_reduction GROUP BY strategy HAVING SUM(cost_reduction) > 10000;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM energy_distribution GROUP BY location;
SELECT energy_type, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM energy_distribution GROUP BY energy_type;
SELECT strategy, AVG(cost_reduction) AS average_cost_reduction FROM cost_reduction GROUP BY strategy ORDER BY AVG(cost_reduction) DESC;
SELECT location, energy_type, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM energy_distribution GROUP BY location, energy_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT energy_distribution.id, energy_distribution.location, cost_reduction.strategy, cost_reduction.cost_reduction FROM energy_distribution LEFT JOIN cost_reduction ON energy_distribution.id = cost_reduction.id;
SELECT location, MAX(cost_reduction) AS max_cost_saved FROM energy_distribution JOIN cost_reduction ON energy_distribution.id = cost_reduction.id WHERE cost_reduction > 5000 GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution WHERE energy_type LIKE '%Gas%';

SELECT location, SUM(cost_reduction) AS total_cost_saved FROM energy_distribution JOIN cost_reduction ON energy_distribution.id = cost_reduction.id WHERE implementation_date <= '2022-12-31' GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT consumer_id, consumption FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumer_id = '12345'
SELECT SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT AVG(consumption) AS avg_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT MAX(consumption) AS max_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT MIN(consumption) AS min_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction
SELECT producer_id, production_amount FROM EnergyProduction
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE producer_id = '67890'
SELECT SUM(production_amount) AS total_production FROM EnergyProduction
SELECT AVG(production_amount) AS avg_production FROM EnergyProduction
SELECT MAX(production_amount) AS max_production FROM EnergyProduction
SELECT MIN(production_amount) AS min_production FROM EnergyProduction
SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution
SELECT distribution_center_id, distribution_amount, cost FROM EnergyDistribution
SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE consumer_id = '13579'
SELECT SUM(distribution_amount) AS total_distribution FROM EnergyDistribution
SELECT AVG(distribution_amount) AS avg_distribution FROM EnergyDistribution
SELECT MAX(distribution_amount) AS max_distribution FROM EnergyDistribution
SELECT consumer_id, consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption > 100
SELECT consumer_id, consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT producer_id, production_amount FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_amount >= 500
SELECT producer_id, production_amount FROM EnergyProduction WHERE timestamp < '2022-03-15'
SELECT distribution_center_id, consumer_id, distribution_amount FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE cost < 50
SELECT distribution_center_id, consumer_id, distribution_amount FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE distribution_amount > 200
SELECT consumer_id, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY consumer_id
SELECT producer_id, AVG(production_amount) AS average_production FROM EnergyProduction GROUP BY producer_id
SELECT distribution_center_id, AVG(cost) AS average_cost, MAX(distribution_amount) AS max_distribution FROM EnergyDistribution GROUP BY distribution_center_id
SELECT consumer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE timestamp >= '2022-04-01' GROUP BY consumer_id
SELECT consumer_id, consumption FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY consumption DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT producer_id, production_amount FROM EnergyProduction ORDER BY production_amount ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT consumer_id, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE timestamp < '2022-05-01' GROUP BY consumer_id HAVING total_consumption > 500
SELECT producer_id, AVG(production_amount) AS average_production FROM EnergyProduction WHERE timestamp >= '2022-03-01' GROUP BY producer_id HAVING average_production > 300
SELECT distribution_center_id, MAX(cost) AS max_cost, MIN(distribution_amount) AS min_distribution FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE timestamp >= '2022-06-01' GROUP BY distribution_center_id
SELECT consumer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE cost < 30 GROUP BY consumer_id HAVING num_transactions > 3
SELECT consumer_id, consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumer_id = '1234' AND timestamp >= '2022-07-01'
SELECT producer_id, production_amount FROM EnergyProduction WHERE producer_id = '5678' AND timestamp <= '2022-08-15'
SELECT distribution_center_id, consumer_id, distribution_amount, cost FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE consumer_id = '9101' AND timestamp >= '2022-09-01'
SELECT consumer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE distribution_center_id = '1112' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31'

SELECT producer_id, AVG(production_amount) AS average_production, MAX(production_amount) AS max_production FROM EnergyProduction WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-11-01' AND '2022-11-30' GROUP BY producer_id
SELECT * FROM EnergyProviders;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM EnergyProviders;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_name FROM EnergyProviders;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumers;
SELECT consumer_name, consumption_rate FROM EnergyConsumers;
SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution;
SELECT provider_id, consumer_id, distribution_date FROM EnergyDistribution;
SELECT SUM(energy_amount) FROM EnergyDistribution;
SELECT * FROM EnergyCosts;
SELECT provider_id, consumer_id, cost_per_kWh FROM EnergyCosts;
SELECT AVG(cost_per_kWh) FROM EnergyCosts;

SELECT provider_name, consumer_name, energy_amount FROM EnergyProviders JOIN EnergyDistribution ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyDistribution.provider_id JOIN EnergyConsumers ON EnergyConsumers.consumer_id = EnergyDistribution.consumer_id;

SELECT provider_name, consumer_name, cost_per_kWh FROM EnergyProviders JOIN EnergyCosts ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyCosts.provider_id JOIN EnergyConsumers ON EnergyConsumers.consumer_id = EnergyCosts.consumer_id;
SELECT provider_name, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy FROM EnergyProviders JOIN EnergyDistribution ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyDistribution.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name;
SELECT provider_name, AVG(cost_per_kWh) AS average_cost FROM EnergyProviders JOIN EnergyCosts ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyCosts.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProviders WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumers WHERE consumer_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT * FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE energy_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM EnergyCosts WHERE cost_per_kWh < 0.10;
SELECT provider_name, consumer_name FROM EnergyProviders, EnergyConsumers WHERE EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyConsumers.consumer_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProviders ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProviders;
SELECT provider_name FROM EnergyProviders WHERE provider_location = 'New York';
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM EnergyProviders WHERE provider_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT provider_name, AVG(energy_amount) AS avg_energy_amount FROM EnergyDistribution GROUP BY provider_id;
SELECT provider_name, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE distribution_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY provider_id;

SELECT provider_name, consumer_name, energy_amount, cost_per_kWh FROM EnergyDistribution JOIN EnergyCosts ON EnergyDistribution.provider_id = EnergyCosts.provider_id AND EnergyDistribution.consumer_id = EnergyCosts.consumer_id;

SELECT provider_name, consumer_name, cost_per_kWh, energy_amount * cost_per_kWh AS total_cost FROM EnergyDistribution JOIN EnergyCosts ON EnergyDistribution.provider_id = EnergyCosts.provider_id AND EnergyDistribution.consumer_id = EnergyCosts.consumer_id;

SELECT provider_name, SUM(energy_amount * cost_per_kWh) AS total_cost FROM EnergyDistribution JOIN EnergyCosts ON EnergyDistribution.provider_id = EnergyCosts.provider_id AND EnergyDistribution.consumer_id = EnergyCosts.consumer_id GROUP BY provider_id;
SELECT provider_name, consumer_name, distribution_date, energy_amount FROM EnergyDistribution JOIN EnergyConsumers ON EnergyDistribution.consumer_id = EnergyConsumers.consumer_id;

SELECT EP.provider_name AS provider_name, EC.consumer_name AS consumer_name, ED.distribution_date AS distribution_date, SUM(ED.energy_amount * EC.consumption_rate * EC.cost_per_kWh) AS total_cost FROM EnergyDistribution AS ED JOIN EnergyConsumers AS EC ON ED.consumer_id = EC.consumer_id JOIN EnergyProviders AS EP ON ED.provider_id = EP.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name, consumer_name, distribution_date;

SELECT DISTINCT EP.provider_name AS provider_name, EC.consumer_name AS consumer_name, ED.distribution_date AS distribution_date FROM EnergyDistribution AS ED JOIN EnergyConsumers AS EC ON ED.consumer_id = EC.consumer_id JOIN EnergyProviders AS EP ON ED.provider_id = EP.provider_id WHERE ED.energy_amount > 1000;

SELECT EP.provider_name AS provider_name, EC.consumer_name AS consumer_name, ED.distribution_date AS distribution_date FROM EnergyDistribution AS ED JOIN EnergyConsumers AS EC ON ED.consumer_id = EC.consumer_id JOIN EnergyProviders AS EP ON ED.provider_id = EP.provider_id WHERE ED.distribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND EC.consumption_rate > 50;

SELECT EP.provider_name AS provider_name, EC.consumer_name AS consumer_name, ED.distribution_date AS distribution_date FROM EnergyDistribution AS ED JOIN EnergyConsumers AS EC ON ED.consumer_id = EC.consumer_id JOIN EnergyProviders AS EP ON ED.provider_id = EP.provider_id WHERE ED.energy_amount * EC.consumption_rate > 5000 AND EC.cost_per_kWh < 0.10;

SELECT EP.provider_name AS provider_name, COUNT(ED.consumer_id) AS num_consumers FROM EnergyDistribution AS ED JOIN EnergyProviders AS EP ON ED.provider_id = EP.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name HAVING num_consumers > 5;

SELECT EP.provider_name AS provider_name, EC.consumer_name AS consumer_name, SUM(ED.energy_amount * EC.cost_per_kWh) AS total_cost FROM EnergyDistribution AS ED JOIN EnergyConsumers AS EC ON ED.consumer_id = EC.consumer_id JOIN EnergyProviders AS EP ON ED.provider_id = EP.provider_id WHERE EC.consumption_rate < 70 GROUP BY provider_name, consumer_name;
SELECT EP1.provider_name AS provider_name, EP2.provider_name AS connected_to FROM EnergyProviders AS EP1 JOIN EnergyProviders AS EP2 ON EP1.provider_id != EP2.provider_id;

SELECT EP.provider_name AS provider_name, AVG(EC.consumption_rate) AS avg_consumption_rate FROM EnergyConsumers AS EC JOIN EnergyDistribution AS ED ON EC.consumer_id = ED.consumer_id JOIN EnergyProviders AS EP ON ED.provider_id = EP.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name;

SELECT EP.provider_name AS provider_name, EC1.consumer_name AS consumer_name, EC2.consumer_name AS connected_consumer FROM EnergyProviders AS EP JOIN EnergyConsumers AS EC1 JOIN EnergyConsumers AS EC2 ON EC1.consumer_id != EC2.consumer_id;

SELECT EP.provider_name AS provider_name, COUNT(DISTINCT EC.consumer_id) AS num_consumers FROM EnergyProviders AS EP JOIN EnergyDistribution AS ED ON EP.provider_id = ED.provider_id JOIN EnergyConsumers AS EC ON ED.consumer_id = EC.consumer_id GROUP BY provider_name;
SELECT provider_name, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy FROM EnergyDistribution WHERE distribution_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY provider_name HAVING total_energy > 500;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProviders
SELECT provider_name, region FROM EnergyProviders
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumers
SELECT consumer_name, location FROM EnergyConsumers
SELECT * FROM EnergyTransactions
SELECT energy_amount, transaction_date FROM EnergyTransactions
SELECT * FROM EnergyPrices
SELECT energy_type, price_per_unit FROM EnergyPrices
SELECT * FROM EnergyGrid
SELECT grid_name, location FROM EnergyGrid
SELECT provider_name, energy_source FROM EnergyProviders
SELECT consumer_name, energy_demand FROM EnergyConsumers
SELECT provider_name, consumer_name, energy_amount FROM EnergyTransactions
SELECT provider_name, energy_type, price_per_unit FROM EnergyProviders INNER JOIN EnergyPrices ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyPrices.price_id
SELECT provider_name, region, transaction_date FROM EnergyProviders INNER JOIN EnergyTransactions ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyTransactions.provider_id
SELECT provider_name, location, capacity FROM EnergyProviders INNER JOIN EnergyGrid ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyGrid.grid_id
SELECT consumer_name, location, energy_demand FROM EnergyConsumers INNER JOIN EnergyTransactions ON EnergyConsumers.consumer_id = EnergyTransactions.consumer_id

SELECT consumer_name, location, energy_demand, price_per_unit FROM EnergyConsumers INNER JOIN EnergyTransactions ON EnergyConsumers.consumer_id = EnergyTransactions.consumer_id INNER JOIN EnergyPrices ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyPrices.price_id
SELECT * FROM EnergyProviders WHERE region = 'North America'
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM EnergyTransactions WHERE energy_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM EnergyPrices WHERE price_per_unit < 0.05
SELECT * FROM EnergyProviders WHERE region = 'South'
SELECT provider_name, energy_source FROM EnergyProviders WHERE energy_source = 'Solar'
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumers WHERE location = 'City Center' ORDER BY consumer_name ASC
SELECT SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy FROM EnergyTransactions
SELECT provider_name, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy FROM EnergyProviders JOIN EnergyTransactions ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyTransactions.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name
SELECT * FROM EnergyTransactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT AVG(energy_demand) AS avg_demand FROM EnergyConsumers WHERE location = 'Industrial Area'
SELECT * FROM EnergyProviders WHERE energy_source = 'Wind' OR energy_source = 'Hydro'
SELECT consumer_name, energy_demand, location FROM EnergyConsumers INNER JOIN EnergyTransactions ON EnergyConsumers.consumer_id = EnergyTransactions.consumer_id

SELECT provider_name, SUM(energy_amount * price_per_unit) AS total_cost FROM EnergyProviders JOIN EnergyTransactions ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyTransactions.provider_id JOIN EnergyPrices ON EnergyProviders.energy_source = EnergyPrices.energy_type GROUP BY provider_name

SELECT provider_name, consumer_name, energy_amount, transaction_date FROM EnergyProviders JOIN EnergyTransactions ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyTransactions.provider_id JOIN EnergyConsumers ON EnergyConsumers.consumer_id = EnergyTransactions.consumer_id

SELECT provider_name, energy_source, price_per_unit FROM EnergyProviders INNER JOIN EnergyPrices ON EnergyProviders.energy_source = EnergyPrices.energy_type WHERE price_per_unit < 0.05 ORDER BY price_per_unit ASC
SELECT * FROM EnergyGrid WHERE capacity > 1000

SELECT provider_name, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy FROM EnergyTransactions JOIN EnergyProviders ON EnergyTransactions.provider_id = EnergyProviders.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name HAVING total_energy > 500
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM EnergyConsumers
SELECT provider_name, energy_source, capacity FROM EnergyProviders JOIN EnergyGrid ON EnergyProviders.region = EnergyGrid.location WHERE EnergyGrid.capacity >= 5000
SELECT * FROM EnergyPrices WHERE energy_type LIKE '%Gas%'

SELECT provider_name, energy_source, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy FROM EnergyProviders LEFT JOIN EnergyTransactions ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyTransactions.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name

SELECT provider_name, consumer_name, energy_amount, transaction_date FROM EnergyProviders JOIN EnergyTransactions USING (provider_id) JOIN EnergyConsumers USING (consumer_id) WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-01-15'

SELECT provider_name, energy_source, AVG(energy_amount) AS avg_energy FROM EnergyProviders LEFT JOIN EnergyTransactions ON EnergyProviders.provider_id = EnergyTransactions.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name HAVING avg_energy > 500
